 */import{canUseDOM}from'fbjs/lib/ExecutionEnvironment';// $FlowFixMe: HTMLStyleElement is incorrectly typed - https://github.com/facebook/flow/issues/2696
export default function createCSSStyleSheet(id){if(canUseDOM){var element=document.getElementById(id);if(element!=null){// $FlowFixMe: HTMLElement is incorrectly typed
return element.sheet;}else{var _element=document.createElement('style');_element.setAttribute('id',id);var head=document.head;if(head){head.insertBefore(_element,head.firstChild);}return _element.sheet;}}else{return null;}}
